query.statement:
SELECT '' AS FLAG , '0' AS CHECK , PCA.MANDT AS MANDT , PCA.PCAPNO AS PCAPNO , PCA.PCAGBN AS PCAGBN , CASE PCA.PCAGBN WHEN 'P' THEN '1' WHEN 'M' THEN '2' WHEN 'N' THEN '3' WHEN 'T' THEN '4' ELSE '' END AS GBN , PCA.PCAPCM AS PCAPCM , PCA.PCAPCC AS PCAPCC , PCA.PCAPID AS PCAPID , PCA.PCAPCS AS PCAPCS , PCA.PCAPMD AS PCAPMD , PCA.PCAPPD AS PCAPPD , PCA.PCAPXD AS PCAPXD , PCA.PCAPLL AS PCAPLL , PCA.PCAPGB AS PCAPGB , PCA.PCAPR1 AS PCAPR1 , PCA.PCAPR2 AS PCAPR2 , PCA.PCAPR3 AS PCAPR3 , PCA.PCAPGN AS PCAPGN , PCB.PCBPME AS PCBPME , PCB.PCBPME AS PCAPME , PCB.PCBPNO AS PCBPNO , H01.RANK AS RANK , H01.RANK_N AS RANK_N , H01.AREA_N AS AREA_N , CASE WHEN H01.IRUM IS NULL THEN H02.IRUM ELSE H01.IRUM END AS IRUM , CASE WHEN H01.DPT1 IS NULL THEN H02.DPT1 ELSE H01.DPT1 END AS DPT1 , CASE WHEN H01.DPT1_N IS NULL THEN H02.DPT1_N ELSE H01.DPT1_N END AS DPT1_N , PCA.PCACOL AS PCACOL , PCA.PCABUY AS PCABUY , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(VALUE(H01.LEAV,'')) AS LEAV FROM SAPHEE.ZPCAF AS PCA LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPCBF AS PCB ON PCA.MANDT = PCB.MANDT AND PCA.PCAPNO = PCB.PCBPNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZHRT001 AS H01 ON H01.MANDT = PCB.MANDT AND H01.PSNO = PCB.PCBPME AND SUBSTR(H01.PSNO, 4,5) != '00000' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPCA_PART AS H02 ON H02.MANDT = PCB.MANDT AND H02.PSNO = PCB.PCBPME WHERE PCA.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND PCA.PCAGBN = 'P'
AND PCA.PCAGBN = 'M'
AND PCA.PCAGBN = 'N'
AND PCA.PCAGBN = 'T'
AND PCA.PCAGBN IN ('P', 'N')
AND PCA.PCAGBN IN ('P', 'M')
AND SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(PCA.PCAPXD) > ''
AND SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(PCA.PCAPXD) = ''
AND PCB.PCBPME LIKE #PCBPME#||'%'
AND (H01.DPT1 = #DPT1# OR H02.DPT1 = #DPT1#)
AND PCA.PCAPNO LIKE #PCAPNO# || '%'
AND PCA.PCAPGB =#PCAPGB#
AND PCA.PCAPCS LIKE '%' || #PCAPCS# || '%'
AND H01.AREA_N =#AREA_N#
AND H01.LEAV > '00000000'
AND SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(VALUE(H01.LEAV,'')) <> ''
ORDER BY DPT1,RANK,PCBPME,GBN
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
